title: problem
body:
Hi guys i have a problem.I download league again.When i opened it after the instal it saiying that is on a repair.I letted it finished but it is not.It is telling something for the repair failed.I tried like 2 times.What can i do???? 


Sorry for my bad english!!!

replies.body:
It sounds like the repairs your client is trying to do just aren't working correctly. If you've already tried running the repair multiple times, you might not have successfully downloaded the installer. 

You can reinstall League by running the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) as admin to do a **Clean Uninstall and Reinstall**.

Check for connection issues, it's possible that your connection is not letting it finish the repair.

Ask yourself these questions; 
Is there a firewall stopping league from downloading?
Am I downloading for the right region?
Am I downloading for the right laptop/computer?

If nothing works submit a request/ticket:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
